dmca.title: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) [ThePlanetAbuse-C34
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, March 12, 2007 4:37 AM To: zzzzzz Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) [ThePlanetAbuse-C3455306O] This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for review and applicable action. Abuse Department The Planet ===================== Original Message ===================== X-MailFrom: TCherkashina@playboy.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Mar 12 09:36:41 2007 Received: (qmail 30023 invoked by alias); 12 Mar 2007 14:36:41 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 30020 invoked from network); 12 Mar 2007 14:36:41 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Mar 2007 14:36:41 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Mar 2007 09:36:40 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 12 Mar 2007 09:36:40 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from TCherkashina@playboy.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HQldg-0000A0-El for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 09:36:40 -0500 Received: from mx2.chi.playboy.com ([216.163.143.14]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from TCherkashina@playboy.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HQldb-000JyT-P7 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 09:36:36 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1173710187-790900690000-bhdmkB X-Barracuda-URL: http://216.163.143.14:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-Barracuda-Connect: chexch.playboy.com[10.20.20.100] X-Barracuda-Start-Time: 1173710187 X-ASG-Whitelist: Client Received: from CHEXCH.playboy.com (chexch.playboy.com [10.20.20.100]) by mx2.chi.playboy.com (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 69D3618176C; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 09:36:27 -0500 (CDT) X-Ninja-PIM: Scanned by Ninja X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C764B3.D572E8EC" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) Date: Mon, 12 Mar 2007 09:36:25 -0500 Message-ID: <9A8EFDB8A197B8478D3FFE26E86C16DF057B92A0@chexch.playboy.com> Thread-Topic: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) thread-index: Acdks8/crcSs3if5QYq6ZvQXNWWnlQ== Importance: high From: "Cherkashina, Tatyana" To: , Priority: Urgent X-Priority: 1 X-Barracuda-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at playboy.com Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of playboy.com designates 216.163.143.14 as permitted sender) client-ip=216.163.143.14; envelope-from=TCherkashina@playboy.com; helo=mx2.chi.playboy.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Mar 2007 14:36:40.0755 (UTC) FILETIME=[D918C030:01C764B3] This is a multi-part message in MIME format. ------_=_NextPart_001_01C764B3.D572E8EC Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable March 12, 2007 =20 ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.=20 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 US =20 abuse@theplanet.com =20 copyright@theplanet.com =20 Dear Sir or Madam: It has been brought to our attention that web pages at Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy"). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on Pwheadlines.com (74.52.105.34) and on all web pages under your control.=20 Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links: http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/categories.php?cat_id=3D32&page=3D1 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/categories.php?cat_id=3D32&page=3D2 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1191 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1192 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1193 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1194 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1195 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1196 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1197 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1198 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1199 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1200 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1201 http://pwheadlines.com/Divas/details.php?image_id=3D1202 =20 I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is tcherkashina@playboy.com. We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately. This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. Tatyana Cherkashina Intellectual Property Assistant=20 =20 cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.=20 =20 =20 =20 =20 ------_=_NextPart_001_01C764B3.D572E8EC Content-Type: text/html; charset="us-ascii" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
